docs.snippet: Combined with the release of Antonio Cromartie on Sunday, the move clears $17.75 million of salary cap space before the N.F.L.’s free agency period starts Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Combined with the release of Antonio Cromartie on Sunday, the move clears $17.75 million of salary cap space before the N.F.L.’s free agency period starts Tuesday.
docs.abstract: NFL Roundup; New York Jets part ways with the talented but injury-plagued wide receiver Santonio Holmes, cutting him after four seasons; other news noted.

headline.main: Jets Cut Former Super Bowl M.V.P. Holmes After a Rocky Four Years
headline.print_headline: In Cap Move, Holmes Is Cut by the Jets
